resources.string: Click on the button below to begin creating your reminder!
Discard your changes and quit editing?
Hi guys,Check out this new Health Calculator with tremendous features,It is amazing! https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=

Body mass index (BMI) is a measure of relative size based on the mass and height of an individual.The BMI is defined as the body mass divided by the square of the body height, and is universally expressed in units of kg/m2,resulting from mass in kilograms and height in metres.

"The body fat percentage (BFP) of a human or other living being is the total mass of fat divided by total body mass; body fat includes essential body fat and storage body fat.The percentage of essential fat is 2–5% in men, and 10–13% in women.The body fat percentage is a measure of fitness level,since it is the only body measurement which directly calculates a person's relative body composition without regard to height or weight."

"Your BMR (Basal Metabolic Rate) is an estimate of how many calories you'd burn if you were to do nothing but rest for 24 hours. It represents the minimum amount of energy needed to keep your body functioning, including breathing and keeping your heart beating.Your BMR does not include the calories you burn from normal daily activities or exercise."

"A person's waist-to-height ratio (WHtR), also called waist-to-stature ratio (WSR),is defined as their waist circumference divided by their height, both measured in the same units.The WHtR is a measure of the distribution of body fat.Higher values of WHtR indicate higher risk of obesity-related cardiovascular diseases;it is correlated with abdominal obesity."

string-array.name: light_status_mode_entries
string-array.item: Off, status bar icons will be white
On, status bar icons will be black
Auto, status bar icons will be black if primary color is light

string-array.name: light_toolbar_mode_entries
string-array.item: Off, toolbar text/icons will be white
On, toolbar text/icons will be black
Auto, toolbar text/icons will be black if primary color is light
